1. Contact

Terms

Call Us:
(732) 247-0922

[The Municipal Building is located at 710 Hermann Road, North Brunswick, NJ 08902. Regular business hours for Township offices are weekdays from 8:30 a.m. to 4 p.m. The Department of Community Development and the Finance, Tax and Water offices are located on the second floor. Administration is located on the third floor. The Township Clerk and Municipal Court offices are located in the lobby. Please call the Township's main phone number below for questions or assistance. Residents and businesses are encouraged to utilize the drop boxes in the municipal parking lot for correspondence; tax and water payments; building, zoning, and fire permit applications.](https://www.google.com/maps/place/The Municipal Building is located at 710 Hermann Road, North Brunswick, NJ 08902. Regular business hours for Township offices are weekdays from 8:30 a.m. to 4 p.m. The Department of Community Development and the Finance, Tax and Water offices are located on the second floor. Administration is located on the third floor.  The Township Clerk and Municipal Court offices are located in the lobby. Please call the Township's main phone number below for questions or assistance. Residents and businesses are encouraged to utilize the drop boxes in the municipal parking lot for correspondence; tax and water payments; building, zoning, and fire permit applications.)

Hours
8:30 a.m. - 4 p.m. Monday-Friday
